name: CAZIRT!
description:
CAZIRT! is a game about colobration and harmony between 2 players.
Both players have to hit each other to create a connection between them.
That connection help them to destroy the meteors.

Rules:

  • Hit each other to create connection
  • Hit the meteors with that connection 
  • Touch the purple gloomy thing to collect them 
  • Avoid from the Purple Tardigrades! 
  • Survive! 

Controls:

  • Player 1: WASD
  • Player 2: Arrow Keys
